title: STREAMING URF MODE!!
body:
New streamer here! 
I was Gold in season 3 but took a long time off.

Starting the climb, but playing some URF mode with you fine people at the moment! 

Come watch, or even join if you like!
Just make sure you click that follow button! =P

See you soon...

replies.body:
Haven't had many people come yet, probably due to the fact that I posted so early in the morning! I'm back on now! 
Hit me up if you're interested in playing some urf/ranked on a live stream!
